summary: This bill, H.R. 4523, proposes technical amendments to title 49 of the United States Code. The amendments primarily focus on improving the clarity and accuracy of the code related to transportation and infrastructure, specifically addressing definitions, direct loans, loan guarantees, and the administration of these programs. The bill makes numerous small changes, such as correcting cross-references and clarifying language throughout the relevant sections. The amendments aim to refine language to ensure the Code's effectiveness.
